text: Nambu, tumanyi kube mundu kuotoje kubekigwa kube jwambone nnongi ja Nnoongo kukengama Malagilo ga Musa, nambu tu kukunhwamini Yesu Kilisto. Na twe uyo tunhwamini Yesu Kilisto ibe tupate kubekigwa kube tambone kwa ndela ja kuamini kwito kwa Kilisto, ngati kukengama Malagilo ga Musaje. Magambu abije mundu ojwapakubekigwa kube jwambone nnongi ja Nnoongo kukengama Malagilo ga Musa.
